title: Finding the Foci
text: Given that we know $$a^2$$ and $$b^2$$, use the equation $$c^2=a^2-b^2$$ to determine the coordinates of the foci
speech: Given that we know  a squared  and  b squared , use the equation  c squared is equal to, a squared minus b squared  to determine the coordinates of the foci
pacedSpeech: Given that we know   a squared
, use the equation   c squared is equal to, a squared minus b squared
to determine the coordinates of the foci
